statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users;
SELECT username, user_id, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, CONCAT(username,'_',user_id) AS concatenated FROM users;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users GROUP BY user_id HAVING user_id > 50;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username FROM users
SELECT username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT user_id, role FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role = 'admin'
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS role_count FROM user_roles GROUP BY user_id HAVING role_count > 1
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE password_hash IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT u.username, ur.role_name, up.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.role_id JOIN user_permissions up ON u.user_id = up.permission_id;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 10 ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_id BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY role_name ASC;
SELECT permission_name, permission_id FROM user_permissions WHERE permission_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY permission_name;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.role_id WHERE users.user_id = 20;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users JOIN user_permissions ON users.user_id = user_permissions.permission_id WHERE permission_name LIKE '%read%' ORDER BY username;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT session_id, session_token, created_at FROM sessions ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2
SELECT username, created_at FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, created_at FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT users.username, COUNT(*) AS num_roles FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id GROUP BY users.username;
SELECT users.username, sessions.session_token FROM users JOIN sessions ON users.user_id = sessions.user_id WHERE users.username LIKE 'a%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT id, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT users.username, user_roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT sessions.user_id, sessions.last_access, users.username FROM sessions LEFT JOIN users ON sessions.user_id = users.id;
SELECT password_resets.user_id, sessions.session_token FROM password_resets JOIN sessions ON password_resets.user_id = sessions.user_id ORDER BY password_resets.reset_requested_at DESC;
